intent_atoms.description: Implement inspect and validate commands with streaming output in the CLI
Asynchronous subcommands must be backed by ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment
Streaming parse events should produce VR-006 research logs
Aggregated validation outcomes must be produced
CLI tests must cover new commands, ensuring research log integration and severity-based exit codes
Global logging and telemetry toggles are surfaced once streaming metrics are exposed via the CLI
Route export operations are routed to shared streaming capture utilities as part of remaining CLI migration

functional_units.description: CLI subcommand that streams parse events and aggregates validation outcomes with severity-based exit codes
